_source.title: Sigma: System Owner or User Discovery
_source.description: Adversaries may use the information from System Owner/User Discovery during automated discovery to shape follow-on behaviors, including whether or not the adversary fully infects the target and/or attempts specific actions.

kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON: {"index": "auditbeat-*", "filter": [], "highlight": {"pre_tags": ["@kibana-highlighted-field@"], "post_tags": ["@/kibana-highlighted-field@"], "fields": {"*": {}}, "require_field_match": false, "fragment_size": 2147483647}, "query": {"query_string": {"query": "(auditd.data.syscall:\"execve\" AND process.name:(\"users\" OR \"w\" OR \"who\"))", "analyze_wildcard": true}}}
